title: Roasted Red Salsa
directions: Roast the tomatoes, chilies, onion and half of the garlic: Halve the tomatoes and chilis and quarter the onion. Place vegis cut side up with half of the garlic on a apan, drizzle with olive oil and a pinch of salt. Roast at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes until onions are soft.
Chop: Finely chop everything roasted, include garlic that was not roasted.
Add juice of 1 lime and a heavy handful of cilantro.
